mapper.insert: insert into tRecipeBoard (nRecipeUserSeq, sRecipeTitle, sRecipePhoto, sRecipeContent, sRecipeTime, sRecipeDifficulty, sRecipeServing, sRecipeIngredient, dtRecipeCreatedAt, dtRecipeUpdatedAt) values (#{recipeUserSeq}, #{recipeTitle}, #{recipePhoto}, #{recipeContent}, #{recipeTime}, #{recipeDifficulty}, #{recipeServing}, #{recipeIngredient}, now(), now())
mapper.select:
select tRecipeBoard.*, tUser.userName from tRecipeBoard LEFT JOIN tUser ON tRecipeBoard.nRecipeUserSeq = tUser.userSeq
where sRecipeTitle like concat('%',#{word},'%')
order by nRecipeIdx desc

select count(*) from tRecipeBoard
where sRecipeTitle like concat('%',#{word},'%')
mapper.update: update tRecipeBoard set nRecipeViewCount = nRecipeViewCount + 1 where nRecipeIdx = #{recipeIdx}
